content.rendered:
Writesonic Review

Chatsonic vs. ChatGPT

What is Writesonic?

Check out the above video (and don’t forget to subscribe to my YouTube Channel – please -). I decided to do a Writesonic review and see everything it had to offer. To summarize, Writesonic generates AI content.AI-generated content is the hype right now with ChatGPT exploding and now Google Bard coming out with their own answer to ChatGPT. But what about the other guys?That’s where apps like Writesonic comes in. 

Free Website Audit

Want an SEO audit for your website?

Please enter your name. Please enter a valid email address. Send now Message failed. Please try again.

Thank you! You’re now on your way to discovering the power of SEO and watching your business grow. Let’s go! 

Write sonic is the main tool (and website). And within Writesonic, you’ll notice a lot of VERY good key features, like:

  • Chatsonic (their version of ChatGPT)
  • Photosonic (their text to image generator)
  • AI article and blog writer
  • Paraphrasing tool
  • Text expander
  • Article summarizer
  • Product descriptions
  • Surfer SEO integration
  • SEMrush integration
  • Facebook Ads
  • Google Ads
  • Landing pages
  • AI article ideas

So as you can see, it offers a ton.

What can Writesonic do that ChatGPT cannot?

During my Writesonic review and after visiting their website, they make sure to mention all of the things Writesonic can do that ChatGPT can’t.

For example: On Writesonic’s website, they tout that their app is like ChatGPT but with 4X superpowers.

Here’s what Writesonic can do that ChatGPT cannot:

  1. Write about current events
  2. Voice your text: Voice search by giving commands to Chatsonic
  3. Text into Art with Photosonic Text to image generators
Schedule a 30 minute call

Chatsonic Review

I really liked Chatsonic. It was fast and punctual. I especially liked all of the pre-generated prompts you can use as a starting guide.

  • SEO-optimized articles
  • Paragraph writer
  • Keyword finder for SEO
  • Keyword strategy
  • Email reply
  • Key success factors of your competitors
  • Outrank article/blog

Now, these are just a few examples of the many prompts Chatsonic has available for you to choose from. I found these extremely helpful.

In addition, you can ask the Chatsonic replay to you in a categorized way. For example, I asked the AI to write me a recipe for baking chocolate chip cookies with a stand-up comedy tone of voice.

Not bad.

Schedule a 30 minute call

Photosonic Review

This was one of the many things I was looking forward to the most. A lot of apps are focusing on this right now, with some of the most popular being Midjourney and Canva’s Magic AI tool.

Now, to be fair I am on the free plan so I don’t know if that would make a difference or not, but I found Photosonic lacking here (when compared to other tools).

It did a good job getting my request for certain content right, but it lacked a little bit on the quality of Canva, and especially Midjourey.
